actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to extend the imposition of mandatory prison sentences to certain additional offenses involving the use of firearms.

summary.text: Amends provisions directing the imposition of additional sentences on persons committing a Federal felony with a firearm or while unlawfully carrying a firearm to prohibit (1) a suspended or probationary sentence with respect to a first conviction and (2) parole prior to serving a period equal to the minimum permissible additional sentence.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to extend the imposition of mandatory prison sentences to certain additional offenses involving the use of firearms.
